Body:
l = TemplateLookup(enable_loop=False)
l.put_string('x',
    """
            <%page enable_loop="True" />
            % for i in (1, 2, 3):
                ${i} ${loop.index}
            % endfor
        """
    )
self._do_test(l.get_template('x'), '1 0 2 1 3 2', template_args=dict(loop=
    'hi'), filters=flatten_result)
